programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: The Portable Door
programme.desc: A man lands an internship at a mysterious London firm with unconventional employees, including the charismatic CEO who is incorporating modern corporate strategy into ancient magical practices.

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: When Mary Lennoxs parents suddenly die, she is sent to live with her uncle, Archibald Craven, on his remote country estate deep in the Yorkshire moors. While exploring, she discovers a hidden magical garden.

programme.title: The Neverending Story
programme.desc: When a lonely young boy begins reading books from a strange bookshop in the back streets of his home town, he is transported to the magical kingdom of Fantasia, which is created by the dreams and imagination of people on Earth, but the land is in danger, and Bastian must find a way to help the Fantasian hero, Atreyu, save his world.

programme.title: Peter Pan
programme.desc: In stifling Edwardian London, Wendy Darling mesmerises her brothers every night with bedtime tales of swordplay, swashbuckling and the fearsome Captain Hook. However, the children become the heroes of an even greater story, when Peter Pan flies into their nursery one night and leads them over moonlit rooftops through a galaxy of stars and to the lush jungles of Neverland.

programme.title: The Portable Door
programme.desc: A man lands an internship at a mysterious London firm with unconventional employees, including the charismatic CEO who is incorporating modern corporate strategy into ancient magical practices.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Volcanologist Trevor Anderson journeys into the Earths core after discovering evidence that the famous authors story was based on fact. Accompanied by his teenage nephew Sean and fellow scientist Hannah, Trevor is soon coming face-to-face with an astonishing and extremely perilous hidden world.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Alan Parrish disappeared as a young boy. Nobody believes his friends story that he was sucked into the game they were playing. Twenty-six years later, two children find the game in their attic, and when they start to play, Alan is released, but the game isnt over yet, and Alan must finish before he is really free.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

programme.title: The Neverending Story
programme.desc: When a lonely young boy begins reading books from a strange bookshop in the back streets of his home town, he is transported to the magical kingdom of Fantasia, which is created by the dreams and imagination of people on Earth, but the land is in danger, and Bastian must find a way to help the Fantasian hero, Atreyu, save his world.

programme.desc: Discover some of the very best Sky Originals to watch with the whole family, from Monster Family to The Amazing Maurice.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Favourites
programme.desc: Discover some of the very best Sky Originals to watch with the whole family, from Monster Family to The Amazing Maurice.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgment by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.title: The Woman in Black
programme.desc: A widowed lawyer encounters ghostly goings-on at the foreboding estate of a recently deceased client.

programme.title: The Woman in Black 2: Angel of Death
programme.desc: 40 years after Eel Marsh Houses first haunting, a group of children and a schoolteacher take refuge at the house, escaping from WWII London. There they will awaken the houses darkest inhabitant.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Hard-drinking country music star Jackson Maine discovers, and falls in love with, a struggling but talented singer named Ally. As her career quickly takes off, Jackson starts to realize that his best days may be behind him.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: A small group of survivors try to stay a step ahead of the vicious, virus-infected humans that have overrun London.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Docs violent, bank-robbing cronies - including Buddy, Bats and Darling - get in and out of Dodge before its too late. Hes not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek Gen. Themistocles leads the charge to fight invading Persian forces led by the god Xerxes -- once a mortal -- and Artemisia.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.title: The Prosecutor
programme.desc: A poor young man is wrongly charged with drug trafficking after being deceived. An ex-prosecutor investigates the case, uncovers a corrupt lawyer teams scheme, and restores justice despite obstruction from evil forces.

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Angelo, an aspiring explorer, is left behind by his distracted parents at a rest stop. He then ventures into a forest inhabited by strange, wonderful creatures to find them.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: Its the year 2025 and an enormous corporation known as The Union has revolutionised the medical world by creating artificial human organs. The only problem is that those benefiting from transplants find themselves heavily in dept with the ruthless company and if the steep bills arent paid so-called repo men are sent in to collect.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Cinema List: Men In Black Films
programme.desc: It is time to protect the Earth from the scum of the universe as we walk through how to join the Men in Black, learning from agents Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, and more.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Front Room
programme.desc: Everything goes to hell for newly pregnant Belinda after her mother-in-law moves in and tries to get her claws on the child.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Escape From the 21st Century
programme.desc: Three friends discover they have the power to travel back and forth twenty years with a sneeze. The future is not as good as they hoped, and they need to take on the responsibility of saving the world.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: An ex-cop sets out on the trail of androids who have mutinied in a bid to extend their limited lifespan and fled back to Earth.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: In the near future, industrial espionage of information systems is so rife, couriers have the information transmitted into implants in their brain that can hold gigabytes of information. Johnny Mnemonic is one of these couriers whos doubled his capacity to a dangerous 180 gigabytes and if he doesnt download in 24 hours, hell die. Unfortunately, a gang of Japanese Yakuza mobsters are after whats in his head.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: When New York City comes under attack from an alien invasion, a woman and other survivors try to find a way to safety. They soon learn that they must remain absolutely silent as the mysterious creatures are drawn to the slightest sound.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Libertys head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A.I.: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Futuristic version of the fairy tale `Pinocchio, about a highly advanced robotic child who longs to become a real boy so he can win back the love of his adoptive mother who abandoned him. He journeys through a violent, dystopian world in a quest for the Blue Fairy who has the power to make his dream come true.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Job Hunting
programme.desc: Fancy a career change? This week, the Cinema List goes hunting for jobs with these film names as a guide. From `The Mechanic to `The Accountant, dust off your CV with these hardworking hits.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances, then funnel the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: A family must navigate their lives in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound. Knowing that even the slightest whisper or footstep can bring death, a couple protect their children while desperately searching for a way to fight back.

programme.title: Live Die Repeat: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: A soldier who was killed in action gets caught up in a time loop, in which he repeatedly relives his last battle. However, the more times he fights, the closer he gets to discovering how to defeat the alien enemy.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The murder of Austrias crown prince leads Holmes, Watson and a Gypsy to a showdown with an evil genius named Moriarty.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken. Two rebels on the run may be able to restore order.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in Americas former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: A young woman, her new boyfriend and her single mother embark on a sailing adventure to Bermuda. However, when criminals suddenly attack their boat, the pleasure trip turns into a desperate fight for survival and a quest for vengeance.

programme.title: He Went That Way
programme.desc: Accompanied by his pet chimpanzee, a celebrity animal trainer picks up a hitchhiker, only to discover his passenger is a cunning young serial killer.

programme.title: Kill
programme.desc: Three brothers return to the remote woodland where they killed their abusive father only to discover his shallow grave is now empty, forcing them to question one anothers loyalty with devastating consequences as fear and paranoia set in.

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: A car crash leaves a playboy maimed and charged with murder in this remake of the mind-bending film `Abre los Ojos.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of a Long Night in the Jungle
programme.desc: Giggles and Tickles are so excited about their birthday the next day that they vow to stay up all night long so that they dont miss a single moment of it. The other animals on the savannah are tired and soon go to bed. Can the mischievous monkeys find ways to keep themselves awake all night and still enjoy their birthday?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of a the Record-Breaking Puffins
programme.desc: Gunnar the gull is encouraging the puffins to break as many records as they can. Their noise is distracting Hercule Moustache, who is busy trying to build a beach sculpture. The puffins do their best not to disturb the walrus.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Ronald and His Boulders
programme.desc: Ronald the rhinos favourite pastime is bashing boulders - but one day he realises there are no more boulders left to bash on the savannah. Ronald sets out to find something else to bash - with almost catastrophic consequences.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the House of Leaves
programme.desc: Nelson the elephant wants to build the biggest and best house of leaves ever. His nephew Nigel is eager to help out, but Nelson is worried that the leaf house might be too fragile for his exuberant young nephew. When the house of leaves comes crashing down, Nelson wastes no time in telling Nigel off.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Gertie the Goat
programme.desc: Gertie the goat has agreed to take Bao Bao the panda on a climbing expedition up the So Hi Mountains. The other animals advise Gertie against the trip, since pandas are not renowned for their climbing skills. Will Gertie and Bao Bao prove the others wrong, or will they need some help from their friends?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Jungle Ball
programme.desc: The Jungle Ball is imminent and all the animals are busy finding their dance partners for the night. All except Reginald - nobody has ever asked him to dance with them at the Jungle Ball. He sets off in search of a dance partner, but has he left it too late?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Great Rains
programme.desc: The savannah animals are busy preparing for the great rains, which are due any day. The rains flood the plains every year and they will have to take shelter on Blue Mountain. This year it is Giggles and Tickles turn to keep watch for the start of the rain.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.desc: Nelson is in an inventive mood, and agrees to make various objects for his friends. Alan the aardvark is excited about the scooter that Nelson is making him - even though he doesnt really know what a scooter is. The other animals all take it in turns to help deliver the scooter to Alan, each making their own modifications to the vehicle on the way. Alan is delighted when his very own scooter eventually arrives.

programme.desc: Thailand is a place of a thousand landscapes, dominated by lush forests, rolling hills and extensive rivers systems that feed into the mighty Mekong. Here the Mekong river continues its journey down the Eastern border, winding its way through biological and geological crossroads, sculpting the landscape and the lives of the creatures that live there.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans and apes at the worlds biggest sanctuary, Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans and apes at the worlds biggest sanctuary, Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre.

programme.title: Animals Like Us
programme.desc: Go rogue with frigate birds who steal meals from smaller seabirds, relax in a mongoose-run spa with a grateful warthog, decode an African elephants secret message, and watch lovelorn capuchin monkeys hurl rocks to attract prospective mates.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America
programme.desc: Marvel at North Americas natural wonders as Lizzie swims through astonishing coral reefs, excavates ancient fossils, and treks through jungles on tropical shores. Observe jaguars prowling a Costa Rican beach and encounter the largest sharks.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong
programme.desc: Thailand is a place of a thousand landscapes, dominated by lush forests, rolling hills and extensive rivers systems that feed into the mighty Mekong. Here the Mekong river continues its journey down the Eastern border, winding its way through biological and geological crossroads, sculpting the landscape and the lives of the creatures that live there.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: Starting up a raccoon adoption agency, Hope tries to make peace between wild enemies and a kidnapped fawn needs to be reunited with its mother.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: At The Nyaru Menteng Orangutan Rescue Centre in Borneo, Indonesia, its extraordinary team of staff rescue orangutans that have been displaced from their habitat or kept as illegal pets, and teach them the skills necessary to survive on their own.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild
programme.desc: When civil war came to Angola, the abundant wildlife of Liuwa was quickly decimated by poachers, and for many years the park lay in a dormant, almost lifeless state.

programme.title: Animals Like Us
programme.desc: Go rogue with frigate birds who steal meals from smaller seabirds, relax in a mongoose-run spa with a grateful warthog, decode an African elephants secret message, and watch lovelorn capuchin monkeys hurl rocks to attract prospective mates.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America
programme.desc: Marvel at North Americas natural wonders as Lizzie swims through astonishing coral reefs, excavates ancient fossils, and treks through jungles on tropical shores. Observe jaguars prowling a Costa Rican beach and encounter the largest sharks.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries
programme.desc: Kenya opens a community-run rhino sanctuary in the heart of Samburu territory.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests
programme.desc: Climbing into a realm of thin air and towering rock as mythical monkeys battle for a winter food stash, lemurs fill a fruit-filled tree canopy, and aromatic trees bring together blossom and possum in a moonlit tryst.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins
programme.desc: A family of lemurs in the rainforest of Mantadia National Park.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins
programme.desc: A look at how Madagascars species have evolved to exploit their various habitats.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins
programme.desc: A look at the cold-blooded residents of Madagascar.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: A calf navigates the Okavango Delta; a Bull searches for a mate; and a Matriarch leads her family through the desert. These individual adventures combine to tell the story of Africas most iconic species.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators
programme.desc: During the summer months, a mother brown bear struggles to find food for her two cubs and a pair of lynx kittens venture away from their den; honeybees pollinate flowers.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators
programme.desc: A wolf pack in the Carpathian Mountains raise their young, the red deer rut commences and a fire salamander searches for a place to hibernate.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America
programme.desc: Marvel at North Americas natural wonders as Lizzie swims through astonishing coral reefs, excavates ancient fossils, and treks through jungles on tropical shores. Observe jaguars prowling a Costa Rican beach and encounter the largest sharks.

programme.title: Coral City
programme.desc: Adapt or perish in the coral streets as higher-than-normal temperatures make autumn cooling (and survival) more difficult. Shack up with a clownfish family and their sea anemone landlord, then see cleaner fish give manta rays a day at the spa.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: Amanda races to save an elephant calf tangled in a poachers wire snare, while back at the rescue centre, Alma tries to get the newest -- and cutest - arrival, a baby baboon nicknamed Doodle Bob, to bond with a foster baboon mother.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: Amanda puts a radio collar on one of the first cheetah cubs born in Malawi in twenty years, the team struggles to give a 4-meter python a physical, and a group of tourists deliver a rambunctious baby monkey they rescued from the pet trade.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: The team prepare to release two beautiful and elusive spotted cats called servals. The plan goes awry when one escapes into the dangerous city of Lilongwe. Meanwhile, its all hands on deck when a baby monkey arrives in a critical condition.

programme.title: Americas Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: Along the worlds longest border between Canada and the USA, wildlife lives in two different worlds. The animals there live on the edge of different habitats with conflicting rules of life.

programme.title: A David Attenborough Special
programme.desc: On his 89th birthday, David Attenborough talks about his career, his recent record-breaking dive on the Great Barrier Reef and issues facing the natural world today.

programme.title: Attenborough At 90: Behind the Lens
programme.desc: In celebration of Sir David Attenboroughs 90th Birthday, this intimate film presents new interviews, eye-opening behind-the-scenes footage and extraordinary clips from some of his most recent films.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: From the Amazon to the Andes, South America has some beautiful scenery. From guanacos sparring over grassland, to marine iguanas head-butting over a beachhead, to home-stealing hermit crabs, the quest for real estate causes a lot of conflict.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: With real-life duelling dragons, giant sumo-wrestling beetles, street-fighting monkeys, and sea turtles that play king of the hill on top of another sea turtle, Southeast Asia boasts a wide range of wildlife warriors.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon
programme.desc: A jaguar stalks the river, a snake makes a killer move and a stealth tarantula waits to strike. Nothing is safe when the Amazons predators are on the prowl.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: It is spring time and the centre is overwhelmed by the amount of babies coming through the doors. The vets fawn over the cutest baby possum.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: The rehab team check on a group of baby rabbits after surviving a nasty dog attack. They have to play mum until they are ready to go back into the wild.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: The rescue team want to assess an injured young coopers hawk that fell into a pool. However, they must find him first.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: The Toronto Wildlife Centres rescue team is called to save a raccoon trapped in a peanut butter jar on a hot summers day.

programme.desc: A visually stunning journey of the natural worlds most awe-inspiring seasonal events including migration, rebirth and transformation.

programme.title: Most Haunted
programme.desc: The team visits an ancient Staffordshire castle steeped in bloody history, where people have reported sightings of many ghosts, including the ghost of a white lady in the castle tower and the ghost of Mary Queen of Scots.

programme.title: Most Haunted
programme.desc: The team visits the Skirrid Inn in Abergavenny, the oldest pub in Wales, where more than 100 people were hanged. A door seems to be opening and closing of its own volition, but can the team find a rational explanation?

programme.title: Most Haunted
programme.desc: Three locations, one investigation. The Heritage Centre, Laffertys Pub, and The Bell Inn give Derby a claim on the title of the most haunted city in Europe. Bodies under the floor at the Heritage Centre; a skull - believed to belong to a murdered woman at Laffertys; and a room that no one will stay in at the Bell Inn, make this investigation one of the most challenging and frightening of the series.

programme.title: Most Haunted
programme.desc: Three locations, one investigation. The Heritage Centre, Laffertys Pub, and The Bell Inn give Derby a claim on the title of the most haunted city in Europe. programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.sub-title: Disabled Helping the Disabled?; Highway Barricade Collision!
programme.desc: A woman is accused of racking up over $7000 in charges on her boyfriends debit card. A young mans mother is accused of suspicious insurance practices after he crashes a vehicle.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A man suing for car damage caused doing repossession claims he was attacked by the repo man when his car was being towed.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Investigators believe a sinister blood trail will lead them to a missing woman, but shes nowhere to be found. Soon fresh evidence crops up.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a young girl is found dead in her backyard, her parents tell the police that she was killed by the family dogs.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Delving into the murky world of forensic investigations with the case of an anonymous letter, sent to the police with information about a murder. When the nature of the information arouses suspicion about the sender, laser technology is used to trace the city, street and office number from where it was sent.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: New Scotland Yard Files
programme.desc: When Laila Rezk was discovered badly beaten in her own home, she died despite all efforts to revive her. Forensic examination eliminated all traces of fingerprints, except one.

programme.title: New Scotland Yard Files
programme.desc: When Geeta Aulakh was fatally attacked on the way to pick up her children, detectives tried to find a motive. The case took a new direction after an informant came forward.

programme.title: Facing Evil
programme.desc: 20 patients at a Texas hospital are murdered. Nurse Vickie Jackson is sentenced to life. She now says shes innocent and knows who the real killer is.

programme.title: Facing Evil
programme.desc: An elderly lady and her care taker are murdered. Earl Linebaugh and Melissa Harris are sentenced to life with no parole, but Melissa says shes a victim too.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: After a woman goes missing, her husband is the prime suspect, until key evidence found in a burned out car sheds new light on the case.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Investigators believe a sinister blood trail will lead them to a missing woman, but shes nowhere to be found. Soon fresh evidence crops up.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a young girl is found dead in her backyard, her parents tell the police that she was killed by the family dogs.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Delving into the murky world of forensic investigations with the case of an anonymous letter, sent to the police with information about a murder. When the nature of the information arouses suspicion about the sender, laser technology is used to trace the city, street and office number from where it was sent.

programme.title: Murder She Solved
programme.desc: Rookie private investigator, Marie Parent puts her life on the line to uncover the horrible truth behind the disappearance of Ottawa freelance journalist Louise Ellis. She delves deep into the mind of a killer to find what police arent able to on their own - the evidence they need to put him away, before he gets away with murder.

programme.title: Murder She Solved
programme.desc: When a respected member of Torontos gay community goes missing, Detective Sgt Pauline Gray and the Toronto Police Service uncover a frightening and intriguing tale of internet sex, extortion, and murder. The investigation culminates in a frantic ground search for the victim, who could be dead or alive, and the massive manhunt for his attacker.

programme.title: Facing Evil
programme.desc: Baby Dylan was 3 months old when his mum shook him to death. She claims it was an accident but was found guilty of murder and sentenced to 50 years.

programme.title: Facing Evil
programme.desc: Stephen Schulhoff was found beaten to death. His daughter Courtney and her boyfriend are found guilty and sentenced to life with no parole, but its not clear who was responsible.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: Marie Robards lost her father, and one year later, her moving performance in a high school play revealed she was harbouring a dark secret.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a young boy is killed in a mysterious fire, his mother is charged with arson, but shes determined to extinguish the accusations.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a man dies unexpectedly in the office of a noted California doctor, police begin what they think will be a routine investigation. What they find throws doubt on the identity of the dead man and raises questions about the doctors role.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A forensic scientist uses scientific knowledge to preserve a footprint left in snow.

programme.desc: A mum and her teen son learn that a mechanic cut corners in fixing up the boys car; a young woman says she never looked online for her cars value.

programme.title: Fawlty Towers
programme.desc: When Basil organises a party to celebrate his wedding anniversary, he insists on keeping it a secret from Sybil, pretending instead that he has forgotten the date. Poor Polly ends up having to pretend to be Sybil when the guest of honour goes off in a huff.

programme.title: Fawlty Towers
programme.desc: Manuel insists that his pet rodent is a Siberian hamster. programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo reaches Birmingham and discovers how a radical reformer would make his mark on the city of a thousand trades. At Highbury Hall he finds Joseph Chamberlains splendid mansion home and hears how he established a political dynasty including a Prime Minister and a Foreign Secretary.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Early 20th century Britain was reeling from industrial strife and suffragette outrages but the biggest crisis of all was the conflict in Ireland. Beginning in Newry, Michael finds a specially chartered train would deliver demonstrators campaigning for Irish Home Rule to a rally in the town.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In Belfasts grand Edwardian City Hall, Michael investigates the scene of a watershed moment in Irish history and hears how thousands of Ulster Protestants were mobilised by train to sign a document pledging opposition to Home Rule for Ireland.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Leaving from the seaport of Larne Michael reaches Stranraerand the Mull of Galloway, where in a lighthouse built by railway engineer, Robert Stevenson, he discovers a magnificent machine, installed at the turn of the 20th century.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek inspects a collection of old police cars that includes a Rover P6 complete with radio, sirens and V8 engine. Meanwhile, Paul tries to figure out who will buy an old 1975 Range Rover that has been converted into a fire engine.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek swaps the chaos of the office for rain-soaked Ripon to collect a 1965 Ford Anglia with just 33,000 miles on the clock. Meanwhile, Dave enjoys the clean lines of a rare Renault Caravalle.

programme.title: Rise of the Nazis
programme.desc: The Nazis have lost in Moscow. Hitler and Stalin take charge of their armies - with no one to hold them back. In Stalin Hitler has met his match - its now a fight to the death.

programme.title: Warbird Workshop
programme.desc: A team of engineers fight to return a veteran Westland Wessex helicopter to the skies, 30 years after its last flight.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team visit Tredegar House near Newport where finds include a locket given by Queen Victoria, a Welsh made classic car and a rather grisly looking implement for creating tattoos.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona and the team travel to Hillsborough Castle, the official royal residence in Northern Ireland. Finds include a medal from the Battle of Waterloo, a rare surviving souvenir of the Great Suffragette Rally in 1908, and a glass ladies dressing table casket.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The teams first purchase is a 1972 VW Fastback, and the second project sees them pick up a 40-year-old police bike.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics

programme.desc: Victor is convinced he is going insane after being trapped in a shed by a swarm of bees, he is stuck in the opticians for a day with his eyes shut, and then left to babysit some unruly children.

programme.desc: Struggling lawyer Anjali Awasthi is determined to restore her familys honour and achieve recognition in her field. Driven by her desire to realise her dreams, she takes on a challenging case that could be her big break.

programme.title: Jhanak
programme.desc: A driven young woman embarks on a journey to fulfil a mothers promise for a better life as she overcomes challenges and loss while crossing paths with a man who further complicates her life.

programme.title: Ishani
programme.desc: After Ishanis dreams are crushed, she sets off to reinvent herself while seeking love.

programme.title: Udne Ki Aasha
programme.desc: Fate poses a threat to Sailees fairytale hopes by tying her in a lifelong bond with Sachin, an uncouth and emotionally scarred taxi driver who shuns the idea of romance and marriage.

programme.title: Kabhi Neem Neem Kabhi Shahad Shahad
programme.desc: Katha Kumari Rathi is a reserved, nature-loving and lively woman whose life gets tangled up with that of charismatic chef UV.

programme.title: Jurm / Crime
programme.desc: Police Inspector Shekhar Varma lives in Khar, Bombay, along with his wife, Meena, and a school-going daughter. His office is notified that editor Ritesh Nandy has received death threats as he comes across evidence that would expose some very influential people.

programme.title: Mujhe Kucch Kehna Hai
programme.desc: A young college student whose mind is more on fun than study is always disappointing his strict father. Fortunately his uncle is always on his side. Karan meets Pooja, whos come to India from America to research the culture and falls in love, but cannot tell her how he feels before she returns to take up her studies at Harvard. Can Karans uncle and sister help him reveal his feelings before its too late?

programme.title: Tapasya
programme.desc: A sisters sacrifice who is left with the responsibility of her three younger siblings.

programme.title: Jigar
programme.desc: Middle-class Raju joins a martial arts school to take revenge on the local champion, who raped his sister.

programme.title: Jersey
programme.desc: Struggling to make ends meet, a former cricketer must decide whether to return to the sport he loves to fulfil his sons wish for a jersey.
